ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Froglok Ton Totem!
ygData.msgSnippet: JBoots: Ancient cyclops spawns in SRo, OOT, and RUMORED to spawn in SKarana, but I ve never seen him ni my 100+ hours in SKarana (with trackers), nor heard of
ygData.messageBody:
JBoots: Ancient cyclops spawns in SRo, OOT, and RUMORED to spawn in SKarana,
but I've never seen him ni my 100+ hours in SKarana (with trackers), nor
heard of him spawning. He drops the Ring of the Ancients. Nice +5 int belt.
Turn in the belt, a shadowed rapier (from shadowmen), and some amount of
gold (2500 gold seems like it, dont' remember), and recieve the Jboots.
Quest given is Hasten Bootstrutter in Rathe Mountians. He and Brother Zeyphl
<sp?> trde spots, Brother Z being up much more common that Hasten.

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: refplace@... [mailto:refplace@...]
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2000 12:14 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Froglok Ton Totem!



There are Jourenymaqns boots which do as you describe but are very rare
drops and a quest.
The rare part is an ancient cyclops in Rathe Mountains I believe.
The froglok totem is droped of froglok ton warriors and is part of a 4part
quest.
The purpose of the quest is to get your Iksar illusion, which I beleive is a
20th lelve spell.




warnock@...


05/12/00 10:41 AM

Calistaah
